name: nativescript-animated-tab-bar
description: RAMAnimatedTabBarController is a Swift module for adding animation to tabbar items. http://ramotion.com.

scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns emulate ios
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-animated-tab-bar && tns plugin add .. && tns install
scripts.setup: cd demo && npm install && cd .. && npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin add .. && cd ..
